content:
That's a great point about online support groups and communities. I think they can be a really valuable resource for people who may not have access to in-person support or who prefer the anonymity of online interactions.

I've also been thinking about how social media can be used to promote positive body image and self-acceptance. Do you think social media can be an effective tool for promoting body positivity and self-acceptance, or does it often perpetuate unrealistic beauty standards?
